replies.msg:
suppose the mean of ability of the population excluding dragon is m.

suppose also the ability of dragon is d.

then the mean x of ability of all population is (d+nm)/(1+n) for n be the number of population excluding the dragon

for x=d/2, requires d/2=(d+nm)/(1+n)↔(1+n)d=2d+2nm←n≠1→ d=2m(n/(n-1))↔d=2m(1+1/(n-1))


For n=1, m has to be zero.
For n>1, d<4m the mean of other population is at least stronger than a quarter of a dragon.


Conclusion:
either the world contains only the dragon and a rubbish before,
or,
the dragon is not that strong

replies.msg:
能係咁：
假設最弱生物戰鬥力為p
而最強古龍的戰鬥力無限接近∞
其餘的生物總戰鬥力為xy
咁佢哋個Mean大概就係：

lim k→∞ f(k) = (p + xy + k) / (x + 2)
= (p + xy + ∞) / (x + 2) = ∞

而lim k→∞ g(k) = (p + k) / 2 = (p + ∞) / 2 = ∞

f = g
Q.E.D.

∴ 麥露戰鬥力 = 最強 = ∞

利申：數學拎F
諗住睇難民番變咗數學討論

視乎數據係點而定
用下面10個data做例
273 65 11 6 8
11 0 0 1 1
中位數係 = (10+1)/2 = 5.5positions
即係拎第5同第6個數加埋除2
將數據由細至大排返
0 0 1 1 6 8 11 11 65 273
中位數 = (6+8)/2 = 7

所以唯一一個解釋
就係Population入面有一半人能力高過女豬

suppose also the ability of dragon is d.

then the mean x of ability of all population is (d+nm)/(1+n) for n be the number of population excluding the dragon

for x=d/2, requires d/2=(d+nm)/(1+n)↔(1+n)d=2d+2nm←n≠1→ d=2m(n/(n-1))↔d=2m(1+1/(n-1))


For n=1, m has to be zero.
For n>1, d<4m the mean of other population is at least stronger than a quarter of a dragon.


Conclusion:
either the world contains only the dragon and a rubbish before,
or,
the dragon is not that strong

點解有條龍係到佢嘅能力值就會勁到咁...
我當條龍能力值10000
而有10000個人嘅能力值係1
咁個平均值都唔會係一半呀嘛

suppose the mean of ability of the population excluding dragon is m.

suppose also the ability of dragon is d.

then the mean x of ability of all population is (d+nm)/(1+n) for n be the number of population excluding the dragon

for x=d/2, requires d/2=(d+nm)/(1+n)↔(1+n)d=2d+2nm←n≠1→ d=2m(n/(n-1))↔d=2m(1+1/(n-1))


For n=1, m has to be zero.
For n>1, d<4m the mean of other population is at least stronger than a quarter of a dragon.


Conclusion:
either the world contains only the dragon and a rubbish before,
or,
the dragon is not that strong
